name: Winter Resort RPG
description:
Visit the world famous Winter Resort, known for Snowbrawl - A competition where participants attempt to knock each other off balance with snowballs in a duel!

Made for the RPGM Winter Jam.  My aim of this game is to make something with actual gameplay, unlike my previous two games. The battle system was inspired by MMBN. It's basically a really simplified version of it! I was unable to finish the game in time for the jam, however.  Hope you enjoy it regardless! Will update with credits, ending and other improvements in the future.
